function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Chronic or acute stresses to which urban resilience is exposed","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases and pandemics","Mitigation":"Investing in public health infrastructure, emergency response capabilities, and community health awareness","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, telemedicine, disease tracking and prediction tools","People":"Urban residents, particularly vulnerable populations","Owner":"Local governments, health organizations, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of preparedness and capacity to learn from past experiences","Impact":"Inability to effectively respond to future challenges, including contagious diseases and pandemics","Mitigation":"Education and training programs, knowledge-sharing platforms, and crisis simulation exercises","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, simulation software, data analytics for risk assessment","People":"Social actors, city officials, and decision-makers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Division of stressors including natural hazards, resource scarcity, and social change","Impact":"Exacerbation of health disparities and challenges in addressing contagious diseases within urban environments","Mitigation":"Sustainable resource management, equitable urban development, and community engagement in public health initiatives","Technologies":"Smart city technology, data analytics for resource management, community health platforms","People":"Urban residents, marginalized communities, public health advocates","Owner":"City planners, environmental organizations, and community advocacy groups"}]}
